explanation: [0-0] A person wearing red clothes sits in front of a table, wearing silver accessories on their right hand, and holding a pink object.
[0-2] Then, a hand pushes a purple toy car loaded with potatoes towards the camera, immediately followed by the right hand pressing a pink-purple toy remote control.
